post_content_localized.en:
Plenty of Pride Events in New York City All Week Long

Get ready to celebrate LGBTQ Pride in New York City! This June, events, parties and the march are in store over one rainbow filled month, all culminating to the biggest events of the season.

What are some highlighted events can you expect?

NYC Pride Family Movie Night takes place at Hudson River Park's Pier 45 with a free, family-friendly movie.

Enjoy Cosplay & Pride on Friday, June 22nd at Hudson River Park's Pier 40.

The annual Pride Rally at the Stonewall National Monument takes place Friday, June 22nd.

Pride Island takes place Hudson River Park’s, Pier 97 June 23rd and 24th.. This event brings soul music all the way to indie pop bands, for an inclusive experience that serves as the center of all Pride celebration.

Make sure to mark your calendar for the Pride Parade and March on Sunday, June 24th and PrideFest, which will be going into its 25th year in 2018. This LGBTQIA+ street fair will be fun for all with exhibitors, entertainers and activities.

There is also plenty of exciting nightlife all week long at various venues with different unique themes.

Don't Miss the NYC LGBT Pride March and Other Summer Events in NYC

If you're planning a trip for Pride Week in New York City or any other festivals in NYC this summer, consider staying with us at The Manhattan Club. We're a boutique style hotel in the heart of downtown Manhattan with access to all of the summer events in NYC just steps away.
